Hayat Ağacı Bungalov 2020'den beri

Hakkımızda

We have been in steel management and management since 1968

With its rich product variety and proximity to its customers, Hasçelik starts the value journey of steel every day, every moment, in every product, and paves the way for its customers to produce products that contribute to life.
